example.parse: ( (IP-CND (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 至今)) (ADVP (AD 已经)) (VP (SB 被) (VP (VV 腰斩) (AS 了) (QP-OBJ (CD ３７０多) (CLP (M 场))))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 联赛))) (VP (ADVP (CS 如果)) (VP (VV 得以) (VP (VV 残存))))))
example.arg: *OP* (*T*-1)->(联赛) 至今 已经 被 腰斩 了 ３７０多 场 的 联赛
